overview: Albert is Managing Director of Yellow&Blue Investment Management. He is also Non-executive Chairman of Plant Health Care PLC, a leading provider of natural products for plant and soil. Albert was previously Managing Partner and Co-founder of Planet Capital, an independent advisory firm in clean technology and a Partner with GreenPartners, an investment firm focused on social and environmental sustainability. Prior to that Albert held various senior positions, including Head of Development, at Elsevier Science, one of the world’s largest providers of scientific and technical information products. Albert holds a PhD degree in Physics from Leyden University and certificates in Marketing (NIMA), Finance (Amsterdam Institute of Finance) and Product Management (IMD, Lausanne).
